DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether extract green tea effective obese woman .
DOC.brief_title: The Extract Green Tea Obese Women : Randomized Double Blindness Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: We conduct pilot study 2005 . The initial finding show extract green tea benefit obese woman . The potential benefit include appetite lowing , lipid marker decrease regulate balance obese related hormone peptide . So designed trial .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1660 year old female 2 . BMI＞27㎞/m2 3 . Signed informed consent 1 . Endocrine disease , e.g . thyroid disorder , pituitary disorder , sex gland disorder . 2 . Heart disease , e.g . arrhythmia , heart failure , myocardial infarction , patient pacemaker . 3 . Allergy Immunology disease . 4 . High aminotransferase ( Alanine , Aspartate ＞80 IU/L ) high serum Creatinine ( ＞2.5 mg/dL ) 5 . Pregnant lactating woman . 6 . Childbirth within 6 month . 7 . Stroke otherwise unable exercise 8 . Management weight control within 3 month . 9 . Any condition deem unsuitable trial evaluate physicianincharge .
